thread.title: Joy Behar Compares Trump to Fox News: ‘They’re on His Level’
thread.title_full: Joy Behar Compares Trump to Fox News: ‘They’re on His Level’

author: Stephen Obregon
title: Joy Behar Compares Trump to Fox News: ‘They’re on His Level’
text:
"The View" co-host Joy Behar said Monday that President Donald Trump appears on Fox News for interviews because "they're on his level" as she and her colleagues criticized the cable network.
Behar and her fellow co-hosts on the ABC show were discussing Trump's allegation that the Obama administration wiretapped him when the panel turned to discuss the validity of Fox News.
Sunny Hostin called Trump's claim fallacious and said the president is going to Fox "News" for his information on the matter, using scare quotes when saying the word "news."
Behar then said why she thinks the president appears on Fox News.
"That's why Trump goes to Fox, because they're on his level," she said.
It is unclear if Behar was trying to imply that Fox is sympathetic to Trump's political views or not a legitimate news outlet.
She then claimed that Fox News host Sean Hannity is "in Trump's pocket."
"Sean Hannity is in his pocket", she said.
 
The post Joy Behar Compares Trump to Fox News: ‘They’re on His Level’ appeared first on Washington Free Beacon .
